text:
Hello,
Could you check all fields when clicking on "Configure" button in View Results Tree, run it again and attach the resulting JTL ?

Thank you

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
Thanks for clarification.
What is the server you're using for Windows 7 ?

The existing test only works for some implementation of Apache HTTPD Server and in a particular configuration (which is the case for jmeter.apache.org)

You Ubuntu Apache HTTPD server is not in this configuration most probably.

I'll wait for your feedback and close issue as WORKSFORME.

If you have an idea of a better test, ideas are welcome.
Thanks
